GrMeshInst * GrMeshInst::Clone ( bool  deep  ) 

public methods

clones a mesh instance. If deep is true, then the mesh and materials are also cloned. Generally, this should be false.

create a new mesh instance.

we need to clone a mesh if it has skinning data associated with it.

return the new mesh instance.

Definition at line 342 of file GrMeshInst.cpp.

bool GrMeshInst::Pick ( GrMesh::STriCollision &  triHit,
const MRay &  ray 
) const

if we don't intersect with our obox, then we know we don't intersect with the mesh.

transform the ray into local space.

now perform the pick operation.

simply return if there were no hits.

go through the tri hits and take the closest one to the ray's origin.

calculate the distance between ray hits

take the minimum and store the tri-hit info.

move the hit location into world space.

return true to indicate success.

Definition at line 453 of file GrMeshInst.cpp.

bool GrMeshInst::Pick ( float &  dist,
const MRay &  ray 
) const

picks against the mesh.

try to intersect with the mesh.

calculate the distance and return.

return true to indicate a hit was made.
